argumentText:
ARGUMENT
w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-word | |- Word S = { w | E. l e. NN0 w : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S } |
| 2 | 1 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( W e. Word S <-> W e. { w | E. l e. NN0 w : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S } ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( W : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S -> W Fn ( 0 ..^ l ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fzofi | |- ( 0 ..^ l ) e. Fin |
| 5 |  | #P_fnfi | |- ( ( W Fn ( 0 ..^ l ) /\ ( 0 ..^ l ) e. Fin ) -> W e. Fin ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( W Fn ( 0 ..^ l ) -> W e. Fin ) |
| 7 |  | #P_elex | |- ( W e. Fin -> W e. _V ) |
| 8 | 3, 6, 7 | #P_3syl | |- ( W : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S -> W e. _V ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_rexlimivw | |- ( E. l e. NN0 W : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S -> W e. _V ) |
| 10 |  | #P_feq1 | |- ( w = W -> ( w : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S <-> W : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_rexbidv | |- ( w = W -> ( E. l e. NN0 w : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S <-> E. l e. NN0 W : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_elab3 | |- ( W e. { w | E. l e. NN0 w : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S } <-> E. l e. NN0 W : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S ) |
| 13 | 2, 12 | #P_bitri | |- ( W e. Word S <-> E. l e. NN0 W : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S ) |
\
 Obsolete proof of ~ iswrd as of 13-May-2020.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 15-Aug-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
